name: Beyond Perception
description:
BEYOND PERCEPTION

Look in 2D, Think in 3D

Beyond Perception is an experimental puzzle game based upon observation and space understanding. Use your mind and imagination to escape from museum paintings.

The first prototype of Beyond Perception has been released during the 2013 7DFPS event. The game has been created in 7 days by Davyn Karan and Jean-Remi Tessier, and Lokhaan composed the musics.

Emedion website : http://www.emedion.com
